text: An la shi women tuoli nimen de zongjiao hou, ruguo women zai qu xin ta, name, women que yi jiajie an la de mingyi er zaoyaole. Chufei an la——women de zhu——yiyu, women bu hui zai xin nimen de zongjiao. Women de zhu de zhishi shi baoluo wanwu de, women zhi tuo kao an la. Women de zhu a! Qiu ni zai women he women de zongzu zhi jian yi zhenli er panjue ba, ni shi zhi shan de panjue zhe.”
